title: A Fun Gaming Live Stream
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Greetings, little demons. Tonight, the time has come for another magical gathering by the Fallen Angel Yohane. Tonight, I shall show you a play of resplendence. Kukuku…. What will happen next, you may look forward to it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hello-, it’s Rin! Yo-.... Rin came to play for Yohane-chan’s game live stream-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hey! It’s not a game live stream, it’s a play of resplendence!! ….Ahem. Well, that’s fine. Today we shall play this…. Follow the light while avoiding various traps, a dark game where if you don’t meet the time limit, you’ll be brutally plunged into the depths of the abyss…. And it starts now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hmm-, alright! Rin will go with the flow here~.... Jump! Go through the windmill, and goooaaaal!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? Aren’t you pretty good. This game is quite challenging, though, here…. And…. there. The controls are a bit quirky…. Alright<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin is apparently good at moving my body both in real life and in-game nya<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That kind of talent exists!? Aah-!! It’s time over~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Did you fall into the abyss?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>No, I’ll retry…. I’ll go until I reach the goal….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin too-! Rin will be the first to clear the next one nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
